LanguageData.ExoskeletonSuit.label: exoskeleton suit
LanguageData.ExoskeletonSuit.description: A high tech device made out of two components: a light skeletal structure to relieve the back and servomotors to make the user stronger.
LanguageData.ProtectiveExoskeleton.label: protective exoskeleton
LanguageData.ProtectiveExoskeleton.description: A high tech device made out of a light skeletal structure and servomotors to support itself and the damage mitigation system used to protect the user.
